original_title: Sri Lanka Women beat Bangladesh Women, win T20I series 2-1
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Women produced an all-round performance to beat Bangladesh Women by 44 runs and claim a 2-1 T20 series win in Colombo.
Chasing 159 to win, Bangladesh Women were restricted to 114 for 7 in their 20 overs, as Sri Lanka's spinner once again proved a challenge for the visitors.
Harshitha Samarawickrama continued in her good form scoring 51 off 42 with Nilakshi de Silva 63 off 39 balls for Sri Lanka to finish on 158 for 3 in their 20 overs.
